name: docker-php-startpage
tagline: A self-hosted start page for organizing server links and widgets
description: Docker PHP Startpage is a customizable, self-hosted landing page for personal servers or homelabs. It allows organizing links, server info, and widgets with minimal setup and can serve as a simple dashboard.

features.title: Customizable Landing Page
features.description: Create your personal server homepage. Organized access point

features.title: Server Info Display
features.description: Show system stats and information. At-a-glance monitoring

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Add custom widgets and information blocks. Flexible dashboard

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Quick deployment with Docker. Start in minutes

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Your personal homepage on your server. Complete customization freedom
